fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Oh my god my eyes why does this color hurt my eyes aaaa: Causes half the players at random to go blind for one day/night, meaning they lose access to all chats, including the main chat. (Rounds up)
They can still vote, but they cant see the voting channel so the host must send their voting message for them
 - super21 repellent: turns anyone who visits your house into super21. Anyone who is super21 can NOT use any actions on you, and will instead use their action on themselves
